response.overview: Our life has no meaning if we don't invent it ourselves. Everyone finds their own ways out and begins to believe in something and makes their choice. But does everyone have this choice? And how much does this choice justify our existence? "Eternal Life" is a personal reflection on this topic on the example of a small provincial town and its inhabitants. From a seemingly everyday and routine picture, the terrible realities of our world emerge, which collide with a child's innocent look at it.
response.title: Eternal Life
